title: transactions
description: JSON schema for BigQuery table transactions

nonce.description: The number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one

transaction_index.description: Integer of the transactions index position in the block

to_address.description: Address of the receiver. null when its a contract creation transaction

gas_price.description: Gas price provided by the sender in Wei

input.description: The data sent along with the transaction

receipt_cumulative_gas_used.description: The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block

receipt_gas_used.description: The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone

receipt_contract_address.description: The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise null

block_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the block where this transaction was in

block_number.description: Block number where this transaction was in

block_hash.description: Hash of the block where this transaction was in
